Start todayStart todayPrivacy Policy1. Information Collected2. Cookies and Web Beacons3. Connections to Third-Party Sites

All the personal information we collect from you will be used to help make your visit to our site more productive and pleasant. Safeguarding the confidentiality of our site users’ personal data is important to us at Axur. All personal information regarding members, subscribers, clients or visitors who interact with our services or our platform will be treated in accordance with the EU’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of May 25th, 2018.

Information Collected

The personal information we collect may include your name, email, phone number, address, date of birth, the company where you work, and/or other items. By using our site, you agree to accept this privacy Agreement. The Axur team reserves the right to change this agreement without prior notice. Therefore, we recommend that you consult our privacy policy regularly in order to remain up to date.

=vLike other websites, we collect and use information contained in advertisements. The information contained in ads includes your IP (Internet Protocol) address, your ISP (Internet Service Provider), the browser you used to visit our website (such as Internet Explorer or Firefox), the time spent during your visit and the pages you visited on our website.

2. Cookies and Web Beacons

We use cookies to store information, such as your personal preferences when you visit our website. This may include a simple pop-up, or a connection to several services that we provide, such as forums.

You have the ability to disable cookies in your browser’s options, or by making changes in the tools found in your antivirus programs, such as Norton Internet Security. However, that may alter the way you interact with our website, or other websites. It could also affect or prevent you from signing in to programs, sites or forums on our system as well as on others.

3. Connections to Third-Party Sites

Axur has links to other websites that we think may contain useful information/tools for our visitors. Our privacy policy does not apply to third-party websites. therefore, if you jump to another website from ours, you should read its privacy policy.

We are not responsible for the privacy policy or the content found on those sites.
